pkgmetadata.longdescription: # pydantic-jsonapi[![Build Status](https://travis-ci.org/DeanWay/pydantic-jsonapi.svg?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.org/DeanWay/pydantic-jsonapi)[![PyPi Link](https://img.shields.io/pypi/pyversions/pydantic-jsonapi.svg)](https://pypi.org/project/pydantic-jsonapi/)an implementation of JSON:api using pydantic for validation```pythonfrom pydantic_jsonapi import JsonApiModelfrom pydantic import BaseModelclass Item(BaseModel): name: str quantity: int price: floatItemRequest, ItemResponse = JsonApiModel('item', Item)# request validationrequest = { 'data': { 'type': 'item', 'attributes': { 'name': 'apple', 'quantity': 10, 'price': 1.20, }, }}ItemRequest(**request)#response validationresponse = { 'data': { 'id': 'abc123', 'type': 'item', 'attributes': { 'name': 'apple', 'quantity': 10, 'price': 1.20, }, 'relationships': { 'store': { 'links': { 'related': '/stores/123' } } } }, 'links': { 'self': '/item/abc123' }}ItemResponse(**response)```
